entry.title: Sunday: Chance of flurries. Temperature falling to minus 17 this afternoon. POP 40%
entry.summary: Cloudy with 40 percent chance of flurries. Wind west 20 km/h becoming light late this afternoon. Temperature falling to minus 17 this afternoon. Wind chill near minus 24. Forecast issued 11:30 AM EST Sunday 22 January 2023

entry.title: Sunday night: Periods of snow. Low minus 19 with temperature rising to minus 15 by morning.
entry.summary: Cloudy. 40 percent chance of flurries this evening. Periods of snow beginning late this evening. Amount 2 cm. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 19 with temperature rising to minus 15 by morning. Wind chill minus 26 this evening and minus 21 overnight. Forecast issued 11:30 AM EST Sunday 22 January 2023

entry.title: Monday: Periods of snow. Temperature falling to minus 24 in the afternoon.
entry.summary: Periods of snow. Amount 2 to 4 cm. Wind becoming north 30 km/h gusting to 50 in the morning. Temperature falling to minus 24 in the afternoon. Wind chill minus 21 in the morning and minus 36 in the afternoon. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 11:30 AM EST Sunday 22 January 2023
